body.name: TARION 𝟰-𝗶𝗻-𝟭 Camera Strap Crossbody: Camera Shoulder Strap Adjustable Sling DSLR Neck Strap Wrist Strap Soft Extra Long Cord Belt for Women Men SLR Mirrorless Cameras Multifunctional MB01 Green
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 1 min
features: 【𝟰-𝗜𝗡-𝟭 𝗠𝗨𝗟𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗨𝗡𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟 𝗖𝗔𝗠𝗘𝗥𝗔 𝗦𝗧𝗥𝗔𝗣】The 4-in-1 DSLR strap includes shoulder, neck, crossbody, and wrist options. It comes with two extension straps featuring quick-release buckles for adjustable length. With a flexible overall length range from 0 inches (camera hand strap) to 57.1 inches (camera sling strap), it suits almost anyone of any height or build.

【𝗨𝗡𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗠𝗜𝗦𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗦𝗔𝗙𝗘𝗧𝗬 𝗪𝗜𝗧𝗛 𝗗𝗨𝗥𝗔𝗙𝗟𝗘𝗫 𝗕𝗨𝗖𝗞𝗟𝗘𝗦】Duraflex's POM quick-release buckle offers a secure and reliable connection by locking all parts safely. The tail buckle connects to cameras using 0.06in Dyneema fiber rope, capable of bearing up to 330 lbs of weight and preventing potential scratches from metal contact. Additionally, the cross-rope knot connection buckle ensures sturdiness and wear resistance for the crossbody camera strap.

【𝗨𝗡𝗜𝗤𝗨𝗘 𝗦𝗧𝗥𝗔𝗣 𝗗𝗘𝗦𝗜𝗚𝗡】Effortlessly customize this adjustable camera strap's length with a pull D-shape ring, tighten or loosen single-handedly. Securely adjust with a locking buckle for steadfast camera placement, easily convert to a camera wrist strap when contracted to its minimum length.

【𝗗𝗨𝗥𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗦𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗟𝗘 𝗦𝗧𝗬𝗟𝗘】This camera shoulder strap boasts dense, high-strength polyester webbing, providing durability and gentle shoulder support. Its exquisite cowhide leather endings, secured by sturdy nylon thread, lend a sleek and minimalist appearance, this lighter yet stronger simple camera strap is perfect for both men and women photographers, and also an ideal choice for summer-day trips, available in three colors.

【𝗦𝗨𝗙𝗙𝗜𝗖𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗧 𝗔𝗗𝗔𝗣𝗧𝗔𝗕𝗜𝗟𝗜𝗧𝗬】This DSLR camera strap uses long, thin but strong Dyneema fiber ropes to connect the camera, making it perfect for most DSLR SLR film cameras, and other types of equipment that have strap eyelets on each side, like some binoculars, monoculars, rangefinders, and so on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Just received it today - exactly what I wanted. I am using it to carry my water bottle at my side. Other straps that I have tried are uncomfortable and have metal hooks that clang noisily against my stainless steel water bottle. This is comfortable, soft, adjustable and quiet. And though I was not sure that it would be strong enough to hold the bottle, I can see now that it is easily up to the task!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Putting it on my camera took a little time because I did not have directions but it wasn't too bad. I was not paid or offered an
reviews.reviewText: This camera neck strap is so cute and durable. I was nervous that it would be cheap and thin, but my worries were gone the second I opened the package. Putting it on my camera took a little time because I did not have directions but it wasn't too bad.I was not paid or offered any discount for this product. All reviews and opinions are my own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for my new camera
reviews.reviewText: Got a new camera for my birthday and needed a new strap. My husband wanted one that didn’t look girly so I found this one. It’s perfect and the coloring is very nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like teal and rustic colors
reviews.reviewText: Need a camera strap? Don't want everyone knowing the brand and type of camera you have? Like teal and rustic colors? Well, there you go. Seriously, it's a simple neck strap. It's not going to give you warm and tinglies. It's going to do the job :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute. Long lasting.
reviews.reviewText: Super cute. Long lasting have had for 3 years. Not the comfiest but dies the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not understand the design, did not fit the camera
reviews.reviewText: Had to order another camera scrap, the design did not fit the Nikon brand camera or as far as I could tell, the camera scrap would not fit any camera , so be aware.I don't recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Stylish Strap
reviews.reviewText: These are the nicest straps that I've been able to find for this price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the Job
reviews.reviewText: Strong and lightweight, it’s just what you need to secure your camera to neck, shoulder, or wrist. It does seem to have a loose end that dangles, or I just can’t find a place to put it. I would buy it again.
Ottimo prodotto, molto comodo e resistente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Leaves bottom of camera free to screw on to monopod or tripod, can have as across body, neck or hand strap.So useful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 11, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Not the most comfy strap in the world but it does the job. I tend to wear it like a satchel bag as it’s comfier. Holds my camera fine, no worries about it coming loose or falling off. Would recommend.

Davvero molto carina e comoda questa tracolla in stile vintage. Si adatta perfettamente alla mia Sony a6000 anche se non sono perfettamente sicuro che i ganci in plastica neri forniti nella confezione siano molto stabili e durevoli da sostenere qualcosa di più pesante di una compatta. Nel mio caso è di colore azzurro ed è veramente molto carina ed estiva come colorazione (non che in inverno non vada bene eh).Vedremo dopo le vacanze come si sarà comportata quanto a comodità e funzionalità
La compre para la cámara de mi hijo y es de buena calidad, un tanto rígida pero muy buena, la recomiendo por la seguridad que transmite así como por su diseño.
